song.title: Happy Hardstyle
song.info:
What the hell Ron ... are you sick?
Ehm.. Ehm .. No, well, have been, but that has nothing to do with the choice of this song. And no, I'm not my faith cases (at least not yet), but I just wanted to know if I instead of always that little string and sweet melodies also have a dance number could write.
Or is this achieved? No idea .... here may you judge.
Comment taken from his website
